extendedInfo.description: Going Camping or Road Tripping Around Australia? Then this is the perfect app for your journey. All you need is a finger, a direction & you are on your way. Campin Australia is the easiest & fastest way to find every â¢Campsite & Campground â¢Caravan & Holiday Park â¢Backpacker & Youth Hostel â¢Highway Roadside Rest Area â¢Day Stop â¢Petrol Station â BP, Shell & Caltex Search by suburb, by map, by name or just by whats around you. With over 10000 stops listed in the app you will never be short on choice when you are looking for somewhere to camp, glamp, ruffit, rest, park, plonk & bunk. Each site listing is packed with info on â¢What facilities are available. â¢Location & Contact Details. â¢GPS Co-Ordinates for when you are out of data range â¢Maps & Directions with Google Maps. â¢You can read other campers reviews or leave one yourself. â¢See images of the site or upload your own for others to see. When you are without an internet connection the app switches to offline mode. You will still be able to find sites & view their important information including address, phone, gps co-ordinates and facilities available. (maps, images,reviews,hot deals & messaging require data signal)* - Please contact us if you have questions or issues, before rating the app low.  We cannot help you if you only post a review & do not email us for support.  For a Free app its pretty comprehensive & we are always looking for ways to improve it.  If you have any suggestions or questions about its operation....let us know - we welcome all feedback.

reviews.title: Long load times
reviews.comment: I tried searching for fuel places in tocumwal in NSW, after pressing toc the loading thing appears, and nothing happens for 20min it just continue s loading with no results, please fix this. I was trying to search camp spots not petrol spots and I had nsw selected. Data connection wasn\'t a problem, i have a telstra wifi device and had full signal so was nothing to do with that.also the marked location for one of the petrol stations was incorrect.
reviews.author: blake james

reviews.comment: Each time I try to search it tells me the app is not working.  I have uninstalled and reinstalled but still no luck
reviews.author: Deb Kuhn

reviews.title: Works great on my Nexus 7
reviews.comment: This app is going to be very handy on my next camping trip. I contacted the developer who replied within minutes. That is greatly appreciated.
reviews.author: Maarten Venter

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Worked when i download it... No updates but keeps looping out before u can search. Might need to uninstall.
reviews.author: Selina Rousseau

reviews.title: Great, can instantly find all the available options.
reviews.comment: Great, can instantly find all the available options for accommodation.   Lists facilities, even phone numbers maps and where applicable has hyperlinks.  Love it, thanks developer.
reviews.author: Chris Gallagher

reviews.title: What about me.....It isn\'t fair...
reviews.comment: The one thing that really annoys people that live in Canberra is that we get treated as though we are part of NSW, we are not. Search criteria needs to include ACT as a separate entity.
reviews.author: Grant Sebastian

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like the remake! Searching improved bigtime by including the option to select a category (caravan, tent, hostel, picknick or fuelstation)!! It needs more photo\'s and reviews though...

reviews.title: Prompt support
reviews.comment: Thought I had encountered problems with data and photos I had submitted not uploading, but it was me being impatient. Tech support was on the ball promptly explaining where I went wrong. Searching after every letter entered is a drag, but, I found by going staight to advanced search I overcame that problem.   Looking forward to submitting photos and reviews to give the app that bit of extra info. Looking forward to next version.
reviews.author: Wendy Green

reviews.title: How does it work?
reviews.comment: How do I find out how to get it to work on my device?  It starts up, I put in the placename (it stops between each letter and does a search so takes a while to put the placename in), I press the Go Campin button ... then Unfortunately Campin has Stopped.   How do I fix this problem?   If I can get it to work I will probably rate it higher, but at this stage it is of no use to me at all
reviews.author: Rachel Jones

reviews.title: Never works
reviews.comment: I type one letter & it never stops trying to load!!! Unusable
reviews.author: Lizzie Liz

reviews.title: Need work on search engine
reviews.comment: Search engine starts the instant a character is entered !? Fix this ..it just causes more frustration using this App. Otherwise this should get 4 Stars
reviews.author: Kenneth Rodrigues

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this app, but why add \"load at boot\"  ?  I use this app on occasion, but DO NOT want it running all the time, possibly going to uninstall
reviews.author: Craig w

reviews.title: I like it .....alot.  Its free & it works!
reviews.comment: I haven\'t had any of the problems with the app crashing as people mentioned.  I wonder if they read the instructions?????  So far I have plotted a trip from Melbourne to Cape Tribulation finding hundreds of choices of places to stay in campgrounds & caravan parks without a problem. The offline version also has the most useful info of how to find sites.  Initial load took a while but hey they claim to have over 6000 sites listed so what are you expecting.    All in all - its free,and it works for me.  So no complaints on my end.   Good job.
reviews.author: Emm Ell

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This didn\'t work at first but I contacted the administrator who helped me trouble shoot. Now it works like a dream. Really easy to use and handy to find sites quickly!!!!.  Maybe the people who say it keeps crashing should contacts them for help with your device as your definitely missing out. Way better than wiki camping!!
reviews.author: Amanda Moglia

reviews.title: All Sorted Now
reviews.comment: Just updated to latest version and it has ironed out any previous bugs.  Works like a dream. Very handy app, comprehensive listings and easy to navigate. I have Samsug Galaxy s3 & Galaxy Tab 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great free app for Camping Around Australia
reviews.comment: Handy app on phone to have.  Easy to use & find what you are looking for in caravan parks with the filter in setup.  Looking forward to getting some hot deals through the app.  * when your data signal is weak sites can take some time to load...i guess its searching through heaps of places. Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Somewhat unstable
reviews.comment: With more users reviews, photos, and comments this app would be great. It is a little unstable on my HTC One XL for some reason. Takes a bit of work to complete searches. Just shows the loading sign for ages. Like I said, more pics and reviews would be great. Even if you simply populated the database off Google images until users begin uploading.
reviews.author: A Google User
